packages.name: DemoStatusBar
packages.author: SparseTweaks
packages.description: Overrides the Status Bar & Lock Screen to display information as if it were a Demo device.
packages.long_description: Overrides the Status Bar & Lock Screen to display information as if it were a Demo device.

packages.name: Springify
packages.author: SparseTweaks
packages.long_description:
Springify is a collection of SpringBoard tweaks, optimized for SparseRestore. 
 
Feature List:
- Disable Breadcrumbs
- Disable Live App Icons
- Disable Reachability
- Disable Notification Center Blur
- Disable Camera Prelaunch
- Show Supervision Text
- Suppress App Shortcut Truncation
- Don’t Lock while Charging
- Don’t Lock after Respring
- Don’t Lock EVER
- Disable Low Power Alert
- Suppress No SIM Alert
- Relaunch FMI on LPM
- Enable WiFi RSSI
- Enable Cellular RSSI
- Enable Status Bar Demo Mode Override
- Enable AirPlay CC Radar
- Disable Proximity Features
